Integration & Deployment Verification

Description:
Coordinate PR merges in dependency order, execute comprehensive integration tests, and verify deployment readiness across all services. This task ensures all parallel development work is properly integrated, tested, and ready for production deployment.

Priority: critical
Status: pending
AgentHint: integration

Dependencies: ALL_OTHER_TASKS

This task serves as the final integration point for the entire project, ensuring:
- All feature PRs are merged in the correct dependency order
- Integration tests pass across all services
- Deployment configurations are validated
- Service health checks confirm system readiness
- No critical bugs or conflicts exist in the integrated codebase
